BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare

Items.Title: Oversight - Update: HRA System of Domestic Violence Shelters
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Update: HRA System of Domestic Violence Shelters

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of social services to report on services and resources provided specific to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, questioning, intersex, gender non-conforming and non-binary residents of domestic violence emergency shelters.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.2381/S.5471, authorizing shelters for victims of domestic violence to be reimbursed for any payment differential for housing a single individual in a room intended for double occupancy.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing shelters for victims of domestic violence to be reimbursed for any payment differential for housing a single individual in a room intended for double occupancy. (A.2381/S.5471)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to report on families with children in shelter.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of homeless services to report on families with children in shelter.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Levin, Treyger and Grodenchik

Items.Title: Oversight - Update: HRA System of Domestic Violence Shelters
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Update: HRA System of Domestic Violence Shelters

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to report on families with children in shelter.
